snippet: The investigation of a respiratory therapist who confessed to mercy killings at one hospital also includes other hospitals that employed him, officials said today.    The police obtained by search warrant ''a variety of records'' pertaining to the...
lead_paragraph: The investigation of a respiratory therapist who confessed to mercy killings at one hospital also includes other hospitals that employed him, officials said today. The police obtained by search warrant ''a variety of records'' pertaining to the employment of the therapist, Efren Saldivar, at Pacifica Hospital of the Valley in Sun Valley, the hospital administrator, Trude Williams, said.
abstract: Investigation of Efren Saldivar, respiratory therapist who confessed to mercy killings at Pacifica Hospital of Valley in Sun Valley, Calif, also includes other hospitals that employed him (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Mercy Killing Inquiry Made at Other Hospitals
